title: Trump wants early exit out of Syria: senior officials
text:
Trump wants early exit out of Syria: senior officials 9:02am EDT - 01:23 
U.S. President Donald Trump is openly considering an early withdraw of American troops from Syria, according to administration sources, a move that could put him at odds with the Pentagon's assessment of the conflict. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump is openly considering an early withdraw of American troops from Syria, according to administration sources, a move that could put him at odds with the Pentagon's assessment of the conflict.
